column4: Hello...May someone help me to get my screen resolution to 1280 x 1024 ? Thank u
I enabled restricted drivers, and I have   "nvidia-settings" but I can't get pasted 800x600 res
brandan - boot into recovery mode of your latest kernel, then select Try to Fix xorg screen, think it's the fourth option
then after it does it's thing, select boot as normal
you mean boot from my Ubuntu disc?
forgive me im a linux b00b...how do i do this?
when it comes up, use arrow keys to move up or down your grub menu
the one on top is your default login, the one under it should say recovery or something
yes, pick recovery, it will come up with a screen with 4 options, select try to fix xorg screen
then boot as normal, it worked for me
ok thank you alots, i will try this and come back if no success..
